channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: We Can Smash Antifa Without Designating Them
item.description: The tools are already in the hands of law enforcement to treat violent members of Antifa with the seriousness they deserve.

item.title: The Fed Should Do One Thing — and One Thing Only
item.description: We don’t want a Democratic Fed or a Republican Fed. We want an American Fed.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Martyrdom Is Bringing People To Christ, And The Church Should Be Ready
item.description: 'For this really to stick, it is not emotion that's going to win the day. It's the message of the gospel, which will not change.'

item.title: Exclusive: Election Group Releases 5-Point Plan To Keep Noncitizens Off Wisconsin’s Voter Rolls

item.title: Erika Kirk Courageously Shows The Two Roads Before America

item.title: The Wrong Tool for Protecting Women from Abortion

item.title: Here Are 6 Of The Most Remarkable Moments From Charlie Kirk’s Memorial
item.description: 'That young man -- I forgive him,' Erika Kirk said. 'I forgive him because it was what Christ did. And is what Charlie would do.'
